title: Neighborhood Defense
fullContent: Home› BattleNeighborhood DefenseBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenNeighborhood Defense is a fortified tower game that challenges players to defend their home from the never-ending waves of zombies.  In this action-packed game, you must strategically place various unique defensive towers across the local map, each with its special strengths and abilities. The key point is to choose the right combination of towers to effectively combat various types of zombies, which can vary in speed, strength and special skills. The mission is as follows: Prevent any zombies from escaping and protect your beloved community from the relentless hordes of undead. As you maneuver your defenses, you'll be faced with the challenge of fighting off waves of zombies that get more dangerous with each passing moment.  With 32 challenging sequences, you must carefully plan their tower placement and use defensive strategies to finish off each attacker effectively. Towers to defend your neighborhood With zombies threatening your neighborhood, it's essential to take more innovative steps to protect your neighborhood. You can start by choosing locations for your towers to maximize visibility and fire, ideally around corners or elevated areas.  A mixture of turrets should be used: some are quick blows to take down fast-moving zombies, others are slower or make it harder for local control. To lure zombies into the kill zone, consider placing trap towers where your firepower can overwhelm them. In your battle against the zombies, each of your four unique towers brings a unique advantage to your defense system.Archer Tower is suitable for rapid-fire attacks from a distance and is perfect for dealing with hordes of zombies.Bomber Tower: emits an explosive blast, making it ideal for taking out groups of tough zombies simultaneously, but it has a slow reloading time.Sniper Tower: excels at picking out zombies from a distance, ensuring it can target costly threats before they get too close.Magic Tower: uses mystical abilities to slow down or confuse zombies, providing vital support for your front-line defense. To achieve your goal of defeating the zombies in this tower defense game, start by analyzing the map layout to determine the zombies' main attack paths. Due to the basic restriction of not allowing more than 14 zombies to escape, optimizing your turret placements and prioritizing upgrades early in the game is important. The first step is to equip the Archer Tower with the easiest option so, make sure there is a clear line of sight to eliminate immediate threats quickly. Move the Bomber Tower back and aim for the choke points set up by zombie groups. This position increases the potential for damage. The Sniper Tower should be placed to cover multiple lanes, ensuring it can take out any fast zombies that slip past other defenses. The Magic Tower should be in the middle to slow the advancing group effectively, giving you plenty of time to finish off your other towers. Upgrades As you progress through the waves and collect upgrade points, prioritize growing your turrets strategically to make them more effective against incoming zombies. By intelligently allocating your upgrade points to each tower and letting everyone progress appropriately to level 5, you'll build a well-rounded defense that can withstand the strongest waves, and ultimately, it will stop any zombies from escaping! You can upgrade the following abilities of the towers:  • Damage • Fire Rate • Attack Speed • Range • Target • Accuracy This article was updated on October 17, 20241 Player2DActionBattleCombatDefenseFreeHeroStrategyTower Defense
